about_the_game:
The digital Forgotten Skies guide covers everything you need to know about the game, how to play it, background on the worlds and characters, and lots of useful tips and tricks.

Content

  • Gameplay Details
  • Key-bindings overview
  • Complete UI-Overview
  • Characters, Worlds and Lore
  • Developer Notes
  • Background information on the game
  • Artworks
  • ...Much more

In addition, the DLC will include numerous comments and notes from the developers about the game, useful background information, and much, much more.
